title: ValentinePage heart icon transparency fix (static asset only)

requirements.summary: Make the ValentinePage decorative heart icon PNG fully transparent so no background box is visible in light/dark overlays.
acceptanceCriteria: On the ValentinePage (the page shown after clicking “Yes”), the decorative heart icon image renders with a transparent background (no solid/rectangular background visible).
Transparency is preserved in both light and dark mode overlays (no halo/solid matte around the image background).

file_operations.description: Edit the existing PNG to remove any solid/matte background and preserve alpha transparency (keep the same filename and dimensions) so it blends cleanly with the ValentinePage background.

requirements.summary: Ensure ValentinePage continues to use the same heart icon image path and unchanged sizing/positioning while applying the transparency fix.
acceptanceCriteria: ValentinePage continues to reference the same image path for the icon set: "/assets/generated/heart-icons-set.dim_256x256.png".
No changes to the ValentinePage positioning/sizing classes for the icon image (only the underlying image transparency changes).

file_operations.description: Add a lightweight test that guards against accidental changes by asserting the ValentinePage heart icon keeps src "/assets/generated/heart-icons-set.dim_256x256.png" and retains its current sizing/positioning className.
